titleStmt.title: Regulæ trium ordinum literarum typographicarum, or, The rules of the three orders of print letters viz. the Roman, Italick, English capitals and small : shewing how they are compounded of geometrick figures, and mostly made by rule and compass, useful for writing masters, painters, carvers, masons, and others that are lovers of curiosity / by Joseph Moxon ...
titleStmt.author: Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
